import React, { useContext } from 'react';
import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext';

const translations = {
    en: {
        welcome: "Welcome, Farmer!",
        subtitle: "AI-Powered Smart Farming Assistant",
        our_services: "Our Services",
        crop_recommendation: "Crop Recommendation",

        disease_detection: "Disease Detection",

        yield_profit: "Yield & Profit",

        crop_planner: "Crop Planner",

        home: 'Home',
        crops_nav: 'Crops',
        health_nav: 'Health',
        yield_nav: 'Yield',
        plan_nav: 'Plan',
        chat_nav: 'Chat',
        namaste: 'Namaste! I am your Kisan Assistant. Ask me anything about farming.',
        thinking: 'Thinking...',
        type_question: 'Type your question...',
        smart_ai_active: 'Smart AI Active',
        offline_knowledge: 'Offline Knowledge',
        assistant_settings: 'Assistant Settings',
        enter_api_key: 'Enter Google Gemini API Key:',
        online_mode: 'Online Mode',
        offline_mode: 'Offline Mode',

        // Crop Recommendation
        search_location: "Search Location",
        location_placeholder: "Enter city, district or state...",
        use_map: "Map",
        detected_location: "Location",
        soil_autofill_hint: "Soil Data Auto-filled",
        or_edit_soil: "OR EDIT SOIL DATA",
        nitrogen: "Nitrogen (N)",
        phosphorus: "Phosphorus (P)",
        potassium: "Potassium (K)",
        ph_level: "pH Level",
        get_best_crops: "Get Best Crops",
        analyzing_soil: "Analyzing Soil...",
        best_match_for: "Best Match for",
        suitability: "Suitability",
        duration: "Duration",
        water_req: "Water",
        check_another: "Check Another",
        alternative_crops: "Alternative Crops",

        // Yield & Profit
        yield_calculator: "Yield & Profit Calculator",
        select_crop_15: "Select Crop (15+ Options)",
        choose_crop: "-- Choose Crop --",
        area_size: "Area Size",
        unit: "Unit",
        acres: "Acres",
        hectares: "Hectares",
        calculate_profit: "Calculate Profit",
        net_profit: "Net Profit",
        estimated_return: "Estimated Return",
        total_yield_label: "Total Yield",
        quintals: "Quintals",
        total_cost_label: "Total Cost",
        input_expenses: "Input Expenses",
        gross_revenue: "Gross Revenue",
        sales_value: "Sales Value",
        expense_breakdown: "Expense Breakdown",
        category: "Category",
        estimated_cost_inr: "Estimated Cost (₹)",
        total: "Total",

        // Price Forecasting
        price_forecasting_title: "Price Forecasting",
        crop_name: "Crop Name",
        state: "State",
        district: "District",
        market_mandi: "Market/Mandi",
        rate_type: "Rate Type",
        wholesale: "Wholesale",
        retail: "Retail",
        msp: "MSP (Min Support Price)",
        select_date_opt: "Select Date (Optional)",
        date_hint: "Leave empty for current price",
        get_forecast: "Get Price Forecast",
        current_price: "Current Price",
        predicted_next_month: "Predicted (Next Month)",
        hold_signal: "Hold Signal",
        sell_signal: "Sell Signal",
        strong_hold_signal: "Strong Hold Signal",

        // Crop Planner
        crop_planner_title: "Comprehensive Crop Planner",
        sowing_date: "Sowing/Planting Date",
        generate_schedule: "Generate End-to-End Schedule",

        upload_plant_images: 'पौधे की छवियां अपलोड करें',
        upload_limit_subtitle: 'पौधे के लक्षण दिखाने वाली अधिकतम 5 छवियां अपलोड करें',
        upload_click: 'छवि अपलोड करने के लिए क्लिक करें',

        analyze_images: 'छवियों का विश्लेषण करें',
        analyzing: 'विश्लेषण कर रहा है...',
        disease_analysis: 'बीमारी विश्लेषण',
        confidence: 'आत्मविश्वास',
        treatment_recommendations: 'उपचार सिफारिशें',
        preventive_measures: 'निवारक उपाय',
        offline_mode_msg: 'आप वर्तमान में ऑफ़लाइन हैं। विश्लेषण के लिए इंटरनेट कनेक्शन की आवश्यकता है।',
        new_analysis: 'नया विश्लेषण',
        download_report: 'रिपोर्ट डाउनलोड करें',
        home: 'होम',
        crops_nav: 'फसलें',
        health_nav: 'स्वास्थ्य',
        yield_nav: 'उपज',
        plan_nav: 'योजना',
        chat_nav: 'चैट',
        namaste: 'नमस्ते! मैं आपका किसान सहायक हूँ। खेती के बारे में कुछ भी पूछें।',
        thinking: 'सोच रहा हूँ...',
        type_question: 'अपना सवाल लिखें...',
        smart_ai_active: 'स्मार्ट एआई सक्रिय',
        offline_knowledge: 'ऑफलाइन ज्ञान',
        assistant_settings: 'सहायक सेटिंग्स',
        enter_api_key: 'गूगल जेमिनी एपीआई की दर्ज करें:',
        online_mode: 'ऑनलाइन मोड',
        offline_mode: 'ऑफलाइन मोड',

        // Crop Recommendation
        search_location: "स्थान खोजें",
        location_placeholder: "शहर, जिला या राज्य दर्ज करें...",
        use_map: "मानचित्र",
        detected_location: "स्थान",
        soil_autofill_hint: "मिट्टी का डेटा ऑटो-भरा गया",
        or_edit_soil: "या मिट्टी का डेटा संपादित करें",
        nitrogen: "नाइट्रोजन (N)",
        phosphorus: "फास्फोरस (P)",
        potassium: "पोटेशियम (K)",
        ph_level: "pH स्तर",
        get_best_crops: "सर्वोत्तम फसलें प्राप्त करें",

        choose_crop: "-- फसल चुनें --",
        area_size: "क्षेत्र का आकार",
        unit: "इकाई",

        quintals: "क्विंटल",

export const useTranslation = () => {
    const { language, changeLanguage } = useLanguage();

    const t = (key) => {
        return translations[language]?.[key] || translations['en'][key] || key;
    };
    return { t, language, changeLanguage };
};
